name: Olympus may have just fallen
description:
This is a simulation of what occured at Capitol Hill in America at the start of 2021.

There´s no real goal involved. I hope for it to inspire a feeling of what it would have felt like to be the overwhelmed security that was on the scene.

Try to keep all the invaders off the screen by clicking on them with the mouse.

(Disclosure: This was not created in the support of events that occurred. This is just a simulation of what happened. It is from an outsiders point of view and I am not claiming to chose any sort of side or support anything)

This game was created as a project for Game Design course at: The University of Applied Science Berlin.

Professor for the course is: Prof. Csongor Baranyai
